Hanan Ibrahim MBE (Somali: , Arabic: ) bụ onye Somalia na-ahụ maka mmekọrịta mmadụ na ibe ya
Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Barnet Muslim Women's Network, n'etiti òtù ndị ọzọ.
Ọ bụ nne nke ụmụ atọ na onye Alakụba. Mgbe agha obodo tiwapụrụ na mba ya, ọ kwagara United Kingdom na 1998.
N'ọrụ ọkachamara, Ibrahim rụrụ ọrụ na Women Interfaith Network, Sisters against Violent Extremism, African SANG na Women's Federation for World Peace.

Mgbe ọ nọ na London, o guzobere Somali Family Support Group (SFSG), otu na-abụghị nke gọọmentị na-enye ndị Somali na UK na ndị ọzọ Horn African. SFSG na-akwalite mkparịta ụka na nghọta n'etiti okpukpe, ma na-akwado ka ụmụ nwanyị sonye n'okwu dị iche iche
Ọ na-enyekwa ọrụ mmekọrịta dịgasị iche iche, gụnyere ụlọ ọrụ ndụmọdụ ezinụlọ, ihe mmata ahụike, enyemaka nyocha ọrụ na ogbako inweta nkà.
Ọ na-eje ozi dị ka Onye isi oche maka Barnet Muslim Women's Network. N'afọ 2008, ọ ghọrọ onye otu SAVE UK Advisory Board, otu Women Without Borders. Ibrahim sokwa n'òtù na akụkụ dị iche iche ndị ọzọ
Ndị nke ikpeazụ gụnyere National Muslim Women Advisory Group na National Community Forum, otu ndụmọdụ maka Ngalaba nke Obodo.
Dabere na ihe ọmụma ya na ahụmịhe ya na iwu, na 2011 ka gọọmentị etiti nke Somalia họpụtara Ibrahim na Kọmitii nke Ndị Ọkachamara (CoE) nke e nyere ọrụ ịkwadebe iwu ọhụrụ nke mba ahụ.
Maka onyinye ya na ọha mmadụ, e nyere Ibrahim na 2004 onyinye Queen's Award for Voluntary Service. Ọ natara onyinye Ambassador For Peace Award na 2009.
N'afọ 2010, ọ meriri London Borough of Barnet Civic Award na Community Engagement Award site na HAYA - Somali Organization na London
N'afọ ahụ, e mere ya onye otu Order of the British Empire (MBE) maka ọrụ obodo ya na SFSG.
